prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a large sea creature with a graceful body.
I want to design a Pokemon that has a serene look and can swim gracefully in the ocean.
Generate a mythical Pokemon with a combination of blue and white colors, perfect for aquatic environments.
Make a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean with a friendly demeanor.
Imagine a creature that can transport trainers across water, featuring a sleek and elegant design.
Show me a Pokemon with a large shell and a gentle expression, suited for calm waters.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that evokes a sense of tranquility and connection with nature.

distinctive_features: Water wave pattern on the body
